header.class: text-cyan-500 text-4xl mb-4 font-extrabold leading-none tracking-tight text-gray-900 dark:text-white

components.header: Transforming good intentions into tangible impacts.
components.text: At CYan People, we believe in the power of generosity and financial sustainability. Join us in building a community that empowers non-profit organizations to thrive while offering individuals the opportunity to earn while making a difference. Together, let's create a brighter future.

content.title: Our Mission
content.text: At CYan People, our mission is twofold: we empower non-profit organizations to generate crucial income for their causes, while simultaneously providing individuals with the opportunity to earn while helping these causes thrive. We believe in the power of mutual benefit, creating a platform where generosity and financial sustainability coexist.

Join us in building a community that transforms good intentions into tangible impacts, ensuring a brighter future for both individuals and the non-profits they support. CYan People make a difference today!

elements.title: Impact
elements.text: Your subscription directly translates into meals for those in need.

elements.title: Transparency
elements.text: We offer complete transparency in our operations

elements.title: Community
elements.text: Join a passionate community of individuals dedicated to ending hunger in Africa.

content.title: Our Story
content.text: CYan People emerged in response to the African hunger crisis post-Covid. Starting with 'Food-On-Every-Table,' we sought aid from companies but faced silence. Adapting, we realized the need to address both hunger and South Africa's 40% unemployment.

content.title: Empowering Impactful Causes
content.text: CYan People is a unique platform uniting non-profits and individuals, offering a means for anyone with a worthy cause to generate income. Our resilient journey aims to make a lasting impact on hunger, unemployment, and funding challenges.

content.title: Our Story
content.text:
Our story at CYan People began in the aftermath of the Covid pandemic when a group of compassionate individuals, dismayed by the growing hunger crisis in Africa, took action. Starting the non-profit 'Food-On-Every-Table' we sought financial support from companies to address the urgent issue of hunger. However, the response was dishearteningly silent, prompting us to reassess our approach. 

 Recognizing the economic challenges faced by businesses, coupled with South Africa's staggering 40% unemployment rate, we understood the need for a sustainable solution that addressed both hunger and unemployment.

components.text:
Moreover, as we delved deeper into the philanthropic landscape, we realized that other noteworthy causes were grappling with similar funding challenges. 

 In response, we developed a unique vehicle at CYan People, offering a means for anyone with a worthy cause to generate income, creating a versatile platform that empowers diverse initiatives. Out of this realization, CYan People emerged â€“ a dynamic solution uniting non-profits and individuals, fostering a community where support and financial sustainability converge to create meaningful change. Our journey reflects the resilience born from adversity, as we strive to make a lasting impact on the lives of those facing hunger, unemployment, and a shortage of funding for their noble causes. 

 Join us in building a community that transforms good intentions into tangible impacts, ensuring a brighter future for both individuals and the non-profits they support. CYan People make a difference today!

CYan People is more than an initiative; it's a movement of compassion, driven by the belief that change is possible when people come together. Whether you're interested in subscribing, volunteering, or partnering with us, we invite you to be a part of our journey.

content.title: How the Helpâ€™em system works
content.text:
When you join as a subscriber, you become a Hope Builder, and the process is straightforward: 
â€¢ Your recruits contribute a monthly subscription fee, determined by their chosen package. 
â€¢ You earn a 40% Monthly Income per Recruit from the monthly subscription fee of each person you bring on board. 
â€¢ Another 40% of the subscription fee is directed towards the cause chosen by your recruit or subscriber. 
â€¢ The remaining 20% is allocated to sustaining, advancing, and continually improving the CYan People system. 
â€¢ Your subscription extends beyond a mere commitment; it embodies a promise of hope. Join us today and be a part of creating a world where we can collectively contribute to each other's well-being.

components.title: Our Values
components.text: At CYan People, our values serve as our guiding light. They include 'compassion', 'transparency,' 'collaboration,' and these principles underpin everything we do. We take pride in our commitment to complete transparency in our operations, ensuring that every contribution makes a meaningful impact.

components.title: Meet our team
components.text: Our success is a testament to the dedication and passion of our team. Meet the individuals who drive CYan People forward, from our founders to our committed volunteers. Together, we share a common goal - to eradicate hunger in Africa and to bring hope to those who need it most.

components.title: Empowerment in Action
components.description: Join us in making a difference. Every step we take brings us closer to a brighter future. Together, we're transforming lives, building communities, and leaving a lasting legacy of compassion and change.

components.title: Join Inaethe: Empower Communities Through Affiliate-Driven Donations
components.description: Inaethe is revolutionizing the way we support causes that matter. With our subscription-based affiliate marketing platform, you can contribute to impactful initiatives while earning rewards. Partner with us to transform donations into meaningful change for communities nationwide.

features.title: Streamlined Donation Collection
features.description: Inaethe simplifies the donation process, ensuring every contribution reaches the right cause efficiently. Our platform is built to maximize transparency and trust for both donors and affiliates.

features.title: Performance Analytics for Affiliates
features.description: Track your campaign performance in real-time with our advanced analytics tools. Monitor the impact of your referrals, optimize your strategies, and maximize your rewards while driving donations.

features.title: Community Engagement Made Easy
features.description: Engage with a passionate network of affiliates and donors who share your vision. Build partnerships, share stories of impact, and inspire others to join the movement.

features.title: Customizable Subscription Tiers
features.description: Choose from flexible subscription tiers designed to suit different needs and goals. Whether youâ€™re an individual donor or a large organization, Inaethe offers solutions tailored to you.

features.title: Secure and Reliable Transactions
features.description: With cutting-edge payment processing, Inaethe ensures every transaction is secure and seamless. Donors can trust that their contributions are protected and efficiently allocated.

features.title: Dedicated Support and Resources
features.description: Our team is here to support you every step of the way. From campaign setup to troubleshooting, Inaethe provides resources and assistance to help you succeed.

components.title: Empowering Donations Through Affiliates
components.description: Inaethe makes it easy for you to contribute to meaningful causes while participating in a sustainable affiliate marketing program. Our platform is designed to ensure that both donors and affiliates can participate seamlessly, securely, and efficiently. Hereâ€™s how it works:

steps.title: Sign Up and Choose a Cause
steps.description: Get started by signing up on the Inaethe platform. You can either join as an affiliate marketer to promote causes or as a donor to contribute directly. Choose the cause or campaign you want to support or promote.

steps.title: Donate or Refer
steps.description: Donors can make direct contributions to their chosen campaigns through secure payment methods. Affiliates can share their unique referral link to encourage others to donate. Each successful referral helps affiliates earn rewards while making a meaningful impact.

steps.title: Track, Earn, and Engage
steps.description: Track your donations or affiliate earnings via the dashboard. Affiliates can monitor their referral success, and donors can see the impact of their contributions. Engage with the community to share experiences and learn more about the campaigns youâ€™re supporting.

components.title: Your Information Is Saved:
components.text: Your details have been securely saved to our database, ensuring a seamless experience as you embark on your journey of giving back. Rest assured, your support is in good hands.

components.title: Make Your First Donation
components.text: It's time to turn your commitment into action! Click the button below to make your first donation to the non-profit organization you've subscribed to. Every contribution, no matter the size, has the power to create positive change.

components.title: Impact in Motion
components.text: With your generosity, you're helping to fund critical projects, support essential services, and make a tangible difference in communities worldwide. Thank you for taking this crucial step toward building a better future for all.
Take pride in knowing that your contribution is making a meaningful impact. Let's continue to spread hope, kindness, and compassion together!

components.title: Thank You for Joining the InaEthe Community!
components.text: Welcome aboard! Your support means the world to us and the non-profit organization you've chosen to subscribe to. Together, we're making a difference and creating positive change in the world.

components.title: Your Impact Matters!
components.text: Your subscription isn't just a transactionâ€”it's a powerful commitment to making a difference. With your support, we're empowering non-profits to create lasting change and improve lives around the world.

components.title: Stay Connected!
components.text: Keep an eye on your inbox for updates, exclusive content, and opportunities to further engage with the organization you've subscribed to. Together, we'll continue to build a brighter future and make a difference in the lives of those who need it most.

components.title: Payment Unsuccessful
components.text: We're sorry to hear that your payment was unsuccessful. Please try again or contact us if you need assistance. Your support is crucial to the non-profit organization you've chosen to subscribe to, and we're here to help you every step of the way.
